sub_title: Wine Educator and Consultant | WSET Level 3
summary:
After a decade of social entrepreneurship and helping young mothers to find their way to happiness and success in life, I’ve changed my career to pursue my passion for the art of wine. I’ve built a solid knowledge about wine making, wine geographies, grapes, terroirs, wine producers, wine pairing, wine tastings and wine distribution. In my current job, I share this knowledge with people who want to know more about wine, experience the difference through wine tasting, buy an expensive or more affordable wine and need expert help, or want to improve their wine sales.

Contact me if you want to talk about anything related to wine, or if you think my services can be helpful for you and your business.
